{{Lang|'''Ganyu'''|zh=甘雨|zh_rm=Gānyǔ}} is a playable [[Cryo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is a [[Illuminated Beasts|half-qilin]] [[Adeptus]] under contract with the Geo [[Archon]] [[Morax]] and serves as the general secretary of the [[Liyue Qixing]].
